A1 an alcoholic drink that is usually made from grapes, but can also be made from other fruits or flowers. It is made by fermenting the fruit with water and sugar: a wine cellar/connoisseur/cooler/glass red/white/dry/sweet/sparkling/table winebottle/glass of wine Let's have a bottle/glass of wine with dinner. I love Australian wines, especially the white wines.wine list Would you like to see the wine list, sir? Synonyms
plonk (WINE) UK informal
vino
